title: Home Decor landing page
description: Crafted with HTML for structuring the content,CSS and JS,this innovative platform redefines the way you design and envision your living spaces. The home decor landing page will serve as a visually stunning and user-friendly showcase of your web development and design skills

title: Recipe Generator
description: This app dynamically generates delectable recipes by incorporating API calls to fetch and display a diverse range of recipes based on user preferences with React JS.  This project aims to provide users with a seamless and enjoyable experience in discovering new and also showcasing proficiency in React.js

title: Book-Store
description: The MERN (MongoDB, Express.Js, React Js, Node.Js) Stack Online Bookstore is a full-stack web application to provide an intuitive platform for books data management. Leveraging the power of the MERN stack,this project delivers a scalable solution.
